content: Una volta, Zhuangzi sognò di essere una farfalla, ma quando si svegliò, non era sicuro se era Zhuangzi che aveva sognato di essere una farfalla o se era una farfalla che ora stava sognando di essere Zhuangzi.
translations: eng:Once, Zhuangzi dreamed he was a butterfly, but when he woke up, he wasn't sure whether he was Zhuangzi who had dreamed b
eng:Once, Zhuangzi dreamed he was a butterfly, but when he woke up, he wasn't sure whether he was Zhuangzi who had dreamt be
